alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:01PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fremont and northwestern Pueblo Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 301 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Penrose, or 23 miles north of Junkins Burn Scar, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence and Penrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
